```{r message=FALSE}
library(plm)
```

## Pseudo-panels

## Modèles linéaires

Modèle de base:
$$y_{i,t} = \alpha_i + \beta_i k_{i,t} + \gamma_i n_{i,t} + \epsilon_{i,t}$$
```{r eval=F}
lineaire <- lm(var_dep ~ var_indep, data=d)
```

Modèle pooled:
$$y_{i,t} = \alpha + \beta k_{i,t} + \gamma n_{i,t} + \epsilon_{i,t}$$
```{r eval=F}
pooled <- plm(var_dep ~ var_indep, 
              data=d, 
              index=c("var_individu","var_temporelle"),
              model="pooling")
```

Modèle à effet fixe:
$$y_{i,t} = \alpha_i + \beta k_{i,t} + \gamma n_{i,t} + \epsilon_{i,t}$$
```{r eval=F}
effet_fixe <- plm(var_dep ~ var_indep,
                  data=d,
                  index=c("var_individu","var_temporelle"),
                  model="within")
```
